Load the required packages:

```{r}
library(ramp.xds)
library(ramp.library)
library(ramp.work)
library(deSolve)
library(rootSolve)
library(graphics)
```

## xde_scaling

The function `xde_scaling()` defines the relationship between the EIR and the PR, and it outputs stable orbits for each value of aEIR in a mesh from $10^{-1}$ up to $10^{3}$

```{r sis, eval=F}
xds_setup_eir(Xname = "SIS") -> sis
```

```{r scaling, eval=F}
xds_scaling(sis, 25) -> sis
```

```{r sis scaling, echo=F}
if(file.exists("./models/sis.rds")){
  sis <- readRDS("./models/sis.rds")
} else {
  sis <- xds_setup_eir(Xname = "SIS")
  xds_scaling(sis, 25) -> sis 
  saveRDS(sis, file="./models/sis.rds")
}
```

```{r plot, fig.height=3.5, fig.width=5}
plot_eirpr(sis)
```
